channel.title: Wsl on 苏的博客

item.title: WSL更换国内源
item.description: WSL Ubuntu18.04LTS 更换国内源 WSL Ubuntu18.04LTS 更换国内源 1.查看 Linux 版本 $ lsb_release -a No LSB modules are available. Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description: Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS Release: 18.04 Codename: bionic 2.备份数据源 $ sudo cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources-backup.list 3.更换数据源 $ sudo vim /etc/apt/sources.list 更换源内容 1.阿里源 deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-security main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-updates main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.aliyun.com/ubuntu/ bionic-proposed main restricted universe multiverse deb http://mirrors.
